text: "Who is the most punctual?"
"Who follows rules the strictest?"
"Who separates the trash the most correctly?"
"Who plans everything in advance?"
"Who is the most efficient?"
"Who complains about everything?"
"Who is the most organized?"
"Who is the most direct?"
"Who has a color-coded file folder for everything?"
"Who starts discussions with 'I'm not racist, but...?' "
"Who shows others the timetable with satisfaction when they are late?"
"Who stands at the platform with a nervous look 10 minutes before departure?"
"Who writes their name on the sandwich in the fridge?"
"Who has a written garage policy?"
"Who immediately complains about cooking smells in the stairwell?"
"Who claps when the airplane lands?"
"Who says 'Phew, that was close' at every yellow traffic light?"
"Who defends the deposit system with national pride?"
"Who internally suffers when an apostrophe is incorrectly placed somewhere?"
"Who thanks the bus driver – even if he was in a bad mood?"
"Who separates trash as if it were about saving the world?"
"Who goes back to the checkout for 0.01€?"
"Who panics at a letter from the property management?"
"Who sells things for 1€ – but only with self-pickup and a time window?"
"Who has more insurance policies than close friends?"
"Who prefers to pay for contactless water in cash?"
"Who ALWAYS has a disposable grill in the trunk?"
"Who considers parking in front of their own house a declaration of war?"
"Who mows the lawn in diagonal patterns?"
"Who reads the manual from start to finish – before assembling?"
"Who reports neighbors anonymously for noise disturbances?"
"Who always knows which supermarket is open on holidays?"
"Who marks off their camping plot with a measuring tape and caution tape?"
"Who calls out extra loudly 'PLEASE!' at the checkout?"
"Who knows the waste collection calendar by heart?"
"Who complains loudly about beer carts on Good Friday?"
"Who plans their vacation with Excel and PowerPoint?"
"Who makes five special requests and then says 'But otherwise it’s fine!'?"
"Who secretly enjoys the notice 'The waiting time is about 12 minutes'?"
"Who has a folder that is only titled 'Taxes 2018–present'?"
"Who simply says 'peace' when asked 'What do you wish for?'"
"Who has more shoes in front of the door than in the closet?"
"Who can't relax when the dishwasher is done but not unloaded?"
"Who has a ritualized grill lighting procedure with instructions?"
"Who hates changing small change – and still picks it up?"
"Who owns a personal favorite stamp?"
"Who has a new password for the guest Wi-Fi for every visitor?"
"Who prints out emails again for safety?"
"Who uses a calendar with color codes, Post-its, and an annual overview?"
"Who neatly returns other people's shopping carts?"
